activities: Endeavour Clinical Solutions is involved in global clinical recruitment activities with EU countries which can involve handling of sensitive personal data, as well as across-border transfer of medical eligibility information for purposes of treatment in clinical research trials.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Lithuania, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Manual and electronic processing of personal data related to clinical trial eligibility criteria.  Only deidentified information is provided to Sponsor and Endeavour.  All data are destroyed once intended use is no longer active.
recoursemech: Endeavour agrees to cooperate fully with legal and/or regulatory supervisory authorities who handle individual complaints.  Further, Endeavour is committed to providing full cooperation with any data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives, and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
